revised_title: A Method for Obtaining Bovine Arterial Blood and its Impact on Mammary Secretion Research
tldr: The authors developed a convenient method for obtaining bovine arterial blood through the internal iliac artery, which allowed them to study the composition of blood entering and leaving the mammary gland. This technique helped researchers understand the precursors in the blood for milk fat and other milk constituents, contributing to the knowledge of mammary secretion and physiology.
